dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: Welcome to the world of Eridoria, where magic and technology coexist in an age of wonder.

dialogue.speaker: Mentor Figure
dialogue.text: You are a young adventurer with a special gift - the ability to wield both magic and machines.

dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: I've heard rumors of a powerful artifact hidden deep within the nearby forest. I think it's time for me to go searching.
